user_query: I'm planning a dinner party for my friends and I need some recipe inspiration. Can you suggest some Italian wedding soup recipes? Additionally, I would like to know the nutritional value and serving size for each recipe. It would be great if you could provide me with reviews from people who have tried these recipes.

TaskList.description: Search for Italian wedding soup recipes.
Retrieve the nutritional value and serving size for each recipe found.
Collect reviews from individuals who have tried the recipes.
